entries.title: Greta Thunberg Detained by Police in Germany During Mine Protest
entries.description: The 20-year-old climate activist joined dozens of demonstrators protesting an expanded coal mine in Lutzerath, a small village 75 miles west of Frankfurt.

entries.title: Killing of Former Afghanistan Lawmaker Highlights Plight of Women Under Taliban
entries.description: Mursal Nabizada was shot dead in her home by unknown gunmen, according to Kabul authorities.

entries.title: China's Economy Faces Deeper Problems Than Its Slowing Growth
entries.description: The country’s shrinking population points to longer-term structural issues that will impede its growth in the future.

entries.title: U.K. to Toughen New Social-Media Law, Threatening CEOs With Jail Time
entries.description: The Online Safety Bill aims to better protect adults and children from viewing certain online content, including fraud, revenge porn and sexual abuse.

entries.title: Moscow Details Plan to Boost Military as Kyiv Warns of Fresh Russian Offensive
entries.description: Russia provided a timetable for the troop increase it outlined in December as Ukraine warned that Moscow may be preparing an offensive.

entries.title: Little-Known Politician to Become German Defense Minister Amid Mounting Challenges
entries.description: Boris Pistorius faces the tough task of reforming ailing armed forces and confronting Russia’s aggression in Ukraine.

entries.title: EU Readies Subsidy Response to U.S. Clean-Tech Tax Breaks
entries.description: Europe aims to provide more support to its domestic clean-tech industry in a push to counter subsidies from the U.S. and China, European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said.

entries.title: Pressure Rises on Bank of Japan for Further Policy Shift
entries.description: The yield on the 10-year government bond repeatedly tops the central bank’s ceiling.

entries.title: World Leaders, CEOs in Davos as Economic Storm Clouds Gather
entries.description: The World Economic Forum’s annual meeting in Davos kicks off in the Swiss resort as economic and geopolitical storm clouds gather.

entries.title: China GDP Growth Fell to Near-Historic Lows
entries.description: China’s economy grew at one of its slowest rates in decades last year as repeated Covid-19 lockdowns hammered households and businesses.
